title: "Strict AI Regulations Could Hinder Federal Agencies: Kiplinger Economic Forecasts"
excerpt: "Though federal regs may need to be modernized for emerging AI tech, there are concerns that Congress will step on the toes of federal agencies with a sweeping AI law that could usurp agency power and hinder a range of work. Another worry is extra red tape that affects all sorts of businesses, big and small."
